ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🐳 Big whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I am a reptile that lives in the ocean.
🏖️ I can be found on beaches, but I live in the ocean.
🥬 I eat plants.

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and say 'glub glub'. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I am a water animal.
🐠 I have fins.
🐡 Some people keep me as a pet.

ocean.question: I make a whooshing sound and come up to the beach and go back to sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am part of the ocean.
🏄 People like to surf on me.
👋 I go in and out.

ocean.question: I am a sea creature with eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I live in the ocean.
🌀 I can squeeze into small places.
🎨 I can change color.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a kind of fish.
🦷 People are sometimes scared of me.
🎬 There are movies about me.

ocean.question: I am hard and you can find me on the beach. People collect me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I used to be a home for a sea creature.
👂 You can sometimes hear the ocean in me.
✨ I can be different colors and shapes.

ocean.question: I am very big and I sing songs in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am a very large mammal.
💦 I breathe air.
🔊 My songs can travel far.

ocean.question: I hide in the sand and snap with my claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I walk sideways.
🦞 Some people like to eat me.
🛡️ I have a hard shell.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am a type of fish.
🤡 My name is similar to someone who wears a wig.
🏠 I live in a sea anemone.

bug.question: I have spots and I can fly. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have black dots.
🔴 I can be red.
🍃 I like to land on leaves.

bug.question: I make honey. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the same color as honey.
🐝 I buzz around flowers.
🍯 I live in a hive.

bug.question: I march in a line and carry things. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🐜 I live in a colony.
🌱 I carry food back to my home.

bug.question: I jump very high and am green. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to hide in the grass.
🎵 I can make a chirping sound.
🦵 I have strong legs for jumping.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and become beautiful. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have colorful wings.
🐛 I used to crawl on the ground.
🌸 I drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I glow in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 I light up at night.
✨ I have a special light in my belly.
🐞 I am a type of beetle.

bug.question: I spin a web. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is sticky.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🪰 I catch my food in my web.

bug.question: I make a buzzing noise and bite. Who am I?

hints.text: 🩸 I drink blood.
🦟 I leave itchy bumps.
🌊 I like to live near water.

bug.question: I look like a stick. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I can be hard to see on trees.
🍃 I eat leaves.
🌱 I am a type of insect.

bug.question: I am green and eat other bugs. Who am I?

hints.text: 🙏 I hold my front legs like I'm praying.
🦗 I am a predator.
🌿 I camouflage in green plants.
